title: Call External Pipeline
description: Send documents to external Fusion Pipeline

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

batching.title: Micro batching
batching.description: Collect documents in small chunks and send them together to target pipeline. Enabling this option makes document processing asynchronous and unordered

certificate.title: Certificate
certificate.description: Self-Signed certificate or Corporate CA certificate in PEM format
